page.title: 07THRUM HALL ESTATE
page.content: About four years ago a new estate was built at the bottom of Thrum Hall Lane. Before that it was all fields and the farmers used to graze their cattle there. Lots of people live there now. It is a very popular estate. There are many different types of dwelling. Quite a few of these are bungalows, some are detached houses but the majority are semi-detached houses. Before the estate was built by the Barratt building company there was no road to the bottom of Thrum Hall Lane. There was only a cobbled lane which led on to a street coming off Bentley Street. There is a new church on Thrum Hall Lane and a Middle School was also built just before the estate was started.
